welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chelsfield, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport provides exclusive services for private aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: Located on the northern side of the airport, handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: Located on the southern side of the airport, handles both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 90-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.
